titles.title: Supply Chain Counterintelligence Training Act of 2019

Supply Chain Counterintelligence Training Act of 2019
Supply Chain Counterintelligence Training Act of 2019
A bill to manage supply chain risk through counterintelligence training, and for other purposes.
Supply Chain Counterintelligence Training Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson without amendment. With written report No. 116-87.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 191.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
